Container.Name: SpotDL-WebGUI
Container.Overview: Container spotDL finds songs from Spotify playlists on YouTube and downloads them - along with album art, lyrics and metadata. Additionally provides a web interface for easily adding media links to process.
Container.Requires: Made avaliable as Unraid template. Please support SpotDL Directly at their repository https://github.com/spotDL/spotify-downloader and add Extra Argument --restart always if you want to always run or restart
